name: Mirror: An "unfinished" poetic journey
description:
potentially NSFW.

Mirror is self-reflective poetic piece about my life, It's a poem about being trans. It's many things. A game is not one of them.

If you're on a mobile device you can also try to access this content via the link below:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/y4fwug1t1uj4878/Mirror.h...


If you're curious about the content, to play through and see every passage in the game you'll have to play at least 4 times, and know what you're looking for.

Praise for Mirror:

@Mismembered touchingly candid and visceral, thank you for making this, and for your courage
— м๏tђєг ¢г๏ฬ (@kittyhorrorshow) June 10, 2015

.@Mismembered Raw and heart-stirring. Thank you for sharing :)
— Mario Castañeda (@wrackune) June 10, 2015
